items.name: Intelligent Automation & AI
items.text: Custom LLM integration, predictive analytics, and RPA (Robotic Process Automation) to eliminate redundancy.

items.name: Mobile App Development
items.text: High-performance React Native and Flutter solutions that deliver native experiences on iOS and Android.

items.name: Web Application Architecture
items.text: Scalable, secure, and responsive web apps built on modern frameworks (Next.js, Node.js, Python).

items.name: Cloud & DevOps
items.text: CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker/K8s), and serverless architecture to ensure your software is always live.
